description: There may be something sinister going on at the source of the hot springs. Is Aqua`s ego leading the party into more trouble?

titles.title: God`s Blessing on This Wonderful Party!
Kono Subarashii Nakama-tachi ni Shukufuku o!
That Time I Got Eaten By A Slime
この素晴らしい仲間たちに祝福を!
為優秀的夥伴獻上祝福！
